summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) personnel discussing a news article about lawmakers demanding a probe into Jeffrey Epstein's 'sweetheart deal' and confirming a USAO case number (2018R01618). It shows internal awareness of public pressure regarding the Epstein case in December 2018.

events.title: Internal Email on Epstein Case and News Article
events.description: U.S. Attorney's Office personnel exchange emails sharing a news article about lawmakers demanding a probe into Jeffrey Epstein's plea deal and confirm a USAO case number for the matter.

keyFacts: The email chain is dated December 6, 2018, and involves personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
It references a news article (NBC News) about lawmakers demanding a probe into Jeffrey Epstein's 'sweetheart deal'.
A USAO case number for the Epstein matter is confirmed as 2018R01618.
The correspondence indicates internal office awareness and discussion of public and political pressure regarding the Epstein case at that time.
